187.movie_plot: A simple, sheltered gardener becomes an unlikely trusted advisor to a powerful businessman and an insider in Washington politics.

157.movie_plot: A day in the lives of two convenience clerks named Dante and Randal as they annoy customers, discuss movies, and play hockey on the store roof.

200.movie_plot: Riggs and Murtaugh are on the trail of South African diplomats who are using their immunity to engage in criminal activities.

175.movie_plot: After training with his mentor, Batman begins his fight to free crime-ridden Gotham City from the corruption that Scarecrow and the League of Shadows have cast upon it.

65.movie_plot: Five high school students meet in Saturday detention and discover how they have a lot more in common than they thought.

237.movie_plot: The families of children who died, sue two companies for dumping toxic waste: a tort so expensive to prove, the case could bankrupt their lawyers.

111.movie_plot: On a weekend trip to Hawaii, a plastic surgeon convinces his loyal assistant to pose as his soon-to-be-divorced wife in order to cover up a careless lie he told to his much-younger girlfriend.

163.movie_plot: Dr. Ellie Arroway, after years of searching, finds conclusive radio proof of extraterrestrial intelligence, sending plans for a mysterious machine.

143.movie_plot: When a sports agent has a moral epiphany and is fired for expressing it, he decides to put his new philosophy to the test as an independent agent with the only athlete who stays with him and his former secretary.

17.movie_name: Star Wars: Episode IV - A New Hope (1977)

126.movie_plot: In a future world devastated by disease, a convict is sent back in time to gather information about the man-made virus that wiped out most of the human population on the planet.

119.movie_plot: Armed with a license to kill, Secret Agent James Bond sets out on his first mission as 007, and must defeat a private banker to terrorists in a high stakes game of poker at Casino Royale, Montenegro, but things are not what they seem.

117.movie_plot: A genetically inferior man assumes the identity of a superior one in order to pursue his lifelong dream of space travel.

172.movie_plot: A playboy becomes interested in the daughter of his family's chauffeur, but it's his more serious brother who would be the better man for her.

204.movie_plot: James Bond willingly falls into an assassination ploy involving a naive Russian beauty in order to retrieve a Soviet encryption device that was stolen by SPECTRE.

49.movie_name: Star Wars: Episode V - The Empire Strikes Back (1980)

60.movie_plot: CIA Analyst Jack Ryan is drawn into an illegal war fought by the US government against a Colombian drug cartel.

223.movie_plot: The adventures of high school and junior high students on the last day of school in May 1976.

100.movie_plot: An exploration of how completely different the television series is from the film. The cast and filmmakers underwent quite a change in order to create the film X Files, The (1998). We are ...

235.movie_plot: After a bitter divorce, an actor disguises himself as a female housekeeper to spend time with his children held in custody by his former wife.

114.movie_plot: A high school teacher's personal life becomes complicated as he works with students during the school elections, particularly with an obsessive overachiever determined to become student body president.

197.movie_plot: A selfish, cynical T.V. executive is haunted by three spirits bearing lessons on Christmas Eve.

149.movie_plot: A young lawyer joins a prestigious law firm only to discover that it has a sinister dark side.

250.movie_plot: An African-American man is hired to find a woman, and gets mixed up in a murderous political scandal.

66.movie_plot: The life of a divorced television writer dating a teenage girl is further complicated when he falls in love with his best friend's mistress.

72.movie_plot: A police officer joins a secret organization that polices and monitors extraterrestrial interactions on Earth.

56.movie_plot: A mobster travels to Hollywood to collect a debt, and discovers that the movie business is much the same as his current job.

132.movie_plot: A man in a legal but hurtful business needs an escort for some social events, and hires a beautiful prostitute he meets... only to fall in love.

6.movie_plot: A man raised by gorillas must decide where he really belongs when he discovers he is a human.

138.movie_plot: A young man is reunited with a mermaid who saves him from drowning as a boy and falls in love not knowing who/what she is.

78.movie_plot: Intent on seeing the Cahulawassee River before it's turned into one huge lake, outdoor fanatic Lewis Medlock takes his friends on a river-rafting trip they'll never forget into the dangerous American back-country.

106.movie_plot: A career bank robber breaks out of jail, and shares a moment of mutual attraction with a U.S. Marshal he has kidnapped.

77.movie_plot: In order to ruin a western town, a corrupt politician appoints a black Sheriff, who promptly becomes his most formidable adversary.

213.movie_plot: A housewife suspects that her seemingly perfect eight year-old daughter is a heartless killer.

58.movie_plot: A young soldier in Vietnam faces a moral crisis when confronted with the horrors of war and the duality of man.

29.movie_plot: In November 1984, the Soviet Union's best submarine captain in their newest sub violates orders and heads for the USA. Is he trying to defect or to start a war?

211.movie_plot: A female Senator succeeds in enrolling a woman into Combined Reconnaissance Team training where everyone expects her to fail.

135.movie_plot: Peaceful farmer Benjamin Martin is driven to lead the Colonial Militia during the American Revolution when a sadistic British officer murders his son.

87.movie_plot: A team of commandos on a mission in a Central American jungle find themselves hunted by an extraterrestrial warrior.

196.movie_plot: Two business rivals who despise each other in real life unwittingly fall in love over the Internet.

1.movie_plot: A misfit ant, looking for "warriors" to save his colony from greedy grasshoppers, recruits a group of bugs that turn out to be an inept circus troupe.

164.movie_plot: A secret agent is sent to Sydney, to find and destroy a genetically modified disease called "Chimera".

210.movie_plot: A substance designed to help the brain repair itself gives rise to a super-intelligent chimpanzee who leads an ape uprising.

193.movie_plot: Denice Crosby takes a first look at the huge fans of Star Trek and how the series from around America has affected and shaped their lives.

64.movie_plot: The aliens are coming and their goal is to invade and destroy Earth. Fighting superior technology, mankind's best weapon is the will to survive.

120.movie_plot: Jack Skellington, king of Halloween Town, discovers Christmas Town, but his attempts to bring Christmas to his home cause confusion.

167.movie_plot: In an afterlife way station resembling a block of hotels, the lives of the recently-deceased are examined in a court-like setting.

104.movie_plot: Ichabod Crane is sent to Sleepy Hollow to investigate the decapitations of 3 people with the culprit being the legendary apparition, the Headless Horseman.

24.movie_name: Star Wars: Episode I - The Phantom Menace (1999)

148.movie_plot: Rudy has always been told that he was too small to play college football. But he is determined to overcome the odds and fulfill his dream of playing for Notre Dame.

253.movie_plot: A provincial boy related to a Shanghai crime family is recruited by his uncle into cosmopolitan Shanghai in the 1930s to be a servant to a ganglord's mistress.

113.movie_plot: A group of passengers struggle to survive and escape when their ocean liner completely capsizes at sea.

131.movie_plot: Loretta Castorini, a bookkeeper from Brooklyn, New York, finds herself in a difficult situation when she falls for the brother of the man she has agreed to marry.

52.movie_plot: A computer hacker learns from mysterious rebels about the true nature of his reality and his role in the war against its controllers.

214.movie_plot: When the crew of the Enterprise learn of a Federation conspiracy against the inhabitants of a unique planet, Captain Picard begins an open rebellion.

227.movie_plot: James Bond teams up with the lone survivor of a destroyed Russian research center to stop the hijacking of a nuclear space weapon by a fellow Agent formerly believed to be dead.

189.movie_name: Star Trek: The Wrath of Khan (1982)

156.movie_plot: A species of South American killer spider hitches a lift to the U.S. in a coffin and starts to breed and kill.

184.movie_plot: Jack Crabb, looking back from extreme old age, tells of his life being raised by Native Americans and fighting with General Custer.

233.movie_plot: Hijackers seize the plane carrying the President of the United States and his family, but he - an ex-soldier - works from hiding to defeat them.

257.movie_plot: When a retired engineer is called upon to rescue a failing satellite, he insists that his equally old teammates accompany him into space.

93.movie_plot: The X-Men send Wolverine to the past in a desperate effort to change history and prevent an event that results in doom for both humans and mutants.

51.movie_plot: A young F.B.I. cadet must receive the help of an incarcerated and manipulative cannibal killer to help catch another serial killer, a madman who skins his victims.

127.movie_plot: A naive teenager is sent to rehab camp when her straitlaced parents and friends suspect her of being a lesbian.

95.movie_plot: A poor village under attack by bandits recruits seven unemployed samurai to help them defend themselves.

21.movie_plot: A U.S. Army officer, despondent about a deadly mistake he made, investigates a female chopper commander's worthiness for the Medal of Honor.

180.movie_plot: An interstellar teleportation device, found in Egypt, leads to a planet with humans resembling ancient Egyptians who worship the god Ra.

134.movie_plot: A former L.A. drug dealer tries to go straight but his past and his underworld connections bring him into the focus of the DEA, the Mexican feds and the Mexican drug cartels.

108.movie_plot: A fast-track lawyer can't lie for 24 hours due to his son's birthday wish after he turns his son down for the last time.

124.movie_name: Austin Powers: The Spy Who Shagged Me (1999)

101.movie_plot: Two separate sets of voluptuous women are stalked at different times by a scarred stuntman who uses his "death proof" cars to execute his murderous plans.

159.movie_plot: A struggling dentist's life is turned upside down when a famous gangster moves in next door, and his wife convinces him to inform a notorious mob boss about the gangster's whereabouts.

32.movie_plot: After the death of a friend, a writer recounts a boyhood journey to find the body of a missing boy.

182.movie_plot: As Earth is invaded by alien tripod fighting machines, one family fights for survival.

244.movie_plot: Three people attempt to stop a gigantic crocodile, who is terrorizing residents in Black Lake, Maine.

89.movie_plot: A cyborg, identical to the one who failed to kill Sarah Connor, must now protect her ten year old son, John Connor, from a more advanced cyborg.

260.movie_plot: In a dystopic and crime-ridden Detroit, a terminally wounded cop returns to the force as a powerful cyborg haunted by submerged memories.

218.movie_plot: Four teenage boys enter a pact to lose their virginity by prom night.

242.movie_plot: When three blue collar acquaintances come across millions of dollars in lost cash they make a plan to keep their find from the authorities but find complications and mistrust weaving its way into their plan.

71.movie_plot: A blade runner must pursue and try to terminate four replicants who stole a ship in space and have returned to Earth to find their creator.

240.movie_plot: An insurance agent is sent by her employer to track down and help capture an art thief.

116.movie_plot: James Bond heads to stop a media mogul's plan to induce war between China and the UK in order to obtain exclusive global media coverage.

188.movie_plot: A nerdy florist finds his chance for success and romance with the help of a giant man-eating plant who demands to be fed.

166.movie_plot: Harry and Sally have known each other for years, and are very good friends, but they fear sex would ruin the friendship.
